subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: A groin injury will keep New Zealand flyhalf Dan Carter sidelined for the rest of the World Cup. His No. 10 uniform will be filled by Colin Slade.
snippet: A groin injury will keep New Zealand flyhalf Dan Carter sidelined for the rest of the World Cup. His No. 10 uniform will be filled by Colin Slade.
